attributes.action: Ignore the petition to revoke Article 50 and leave the EU on 30th June 2019.
attributes.background: People in Britain seem to ignore the fact that we have already had the referendum which has led to the current position the UK has found itself in. The wish of the people still stands to leave the EU, guaranteed by the democratic process that has been followed since 2015. We do not wish for another.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

The current proposed extensions to Article 50 are to 12 April and 22 May. We aren't sure whether you would like a further extension to Article 50 or for the UK to leave the EU as soon as possible.
